articles.title: Africa: New study suggests climate change could mean declining malaria risk - Africanews English
articles.description: Researchers predict that the hot and dry conditions brought about by climate change will lead to an overall decrease in areas suitable for malaria transmission from 2025 onwards.
articles.content:
Will the climate crisis could lead to a reduction of malaria cases in Africa?
A new study led by the British University of Leeds predict that the hot and dry conditions brought about by climate chan… [+1810 chars]
